rdf:Description.rdf:_1: Extracellular recordings from anterior lateral motor cortex (ALM) neurons of adult mice performing a tactile decision behavior

rdf:Description.odml:hasDefinition: Behavior metadata
Source of virus. Examples: Upenn, Janelia core, investigator, other
algorithm or manual; for algorithm, provide citation of the original method paper

rdf:Description.rdf:_1: These experiments probe neural dynamics in the anterior motor cortex (ALM) and its relationship to voluntary movement. The data represent extracellular recordings from ALM neurons of adult mice performing a tactile decision behavior. Mouse uses whisker to detect which of two possible positions a pole is in. After a delay, the mice indicate the pole position by licking a sensor either on the right or left. During the experiment extracellular recordings were made from ALM neurons using 32 channels. Photostimulation was used to generate antidromic spikes in either layer 5 IT (Intratelencephalic) neuron axons through a cranial window over contra-lateral ALM or PT (Pyramidal Tract) neuron axons through an optical fiber in the ipsi-lateral brainstem.

rdf:Description.odml:hasDefinition: Specifies the types of surgical manipulations. Not exclusive. Examples: Virus injection/fiber implant/window implant/drug injection/electroporation
rolloff frequency of the recording system, kHz
(ml, ap, depth) relative to bregma; in millimeters
Example: ALM
Example: waveform shape, ChR tagging
(ml, ap, depth) relative to bregma; in millimeters
Format: hhmmss (international standard notation)

Location of probe 1 (ml, ap, depth) relative to bregma; in millimeters. This is the center of the tips; for example, the location in a 4-shank electrode will be specified as a point along the tips, but between the two center shanks. Example: P: 1.5; Lat: 3.5; depth
location according to reference atlas or anatomy or ISI; Example: vS1, C2, Paxinos or ISI
Weight of subject at the beginning of the experiment, in grams; Example: 20
Weight of subject at the end of the experiment, in grams; Example: 21
